article.title: SAIC to Support U.S. Military Training Mission to Saudi Arabia
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a prime contract by the U.S. Military Training Mission to support the Saudi Arabian Armed Forces by establishing a Saudi War College that meets the educational and administrative standards of the U.S. war colleges. The contract has a value of more than $11 million if all options are exercised.
